description.None: Upgrade a <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> in your hand to a random side.
description.A: Upgrade a <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> in your hand or deck to a random side.
description.B: Upgrade a <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> in your hand to a side of your choice.

description.None: Add an uncommon <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> card of your choice.
description.A: Add an unommon <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> card of your choice.
description.B: Add two uncommon <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> cards of your choice.

description.None: Exhaust a <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> in your hand. When you do, <c=hurt>Attack 2</c>.
description.A: Exhaust a <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> in your hand. When you do, <c=hurt>Attack 4</c>.
description.B: Exhaust a <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> in your hand. When you do, <c=hurt>Attack 2</c>.

description.None: Play the top <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> from your deck. <c=hurt>Attack 1</c>.
description.A: Play the top <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> from your deck. <c=hurt>Attack 1</c>.
description.B: Play the top two <c=abf5ff>Potions</c> from your deck. <c=hurt>Attack 1</c>.

description.None: Add a common <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> card of your choice.
description.A: Add a common <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> card of your choice.
description.B: Add two common <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> cards of your choice.

description.None: Draw and play all <c=abf5ff>Potions</c> from your deck.
description.A: Draw and play all <c=abf5ff>Potions</c> from your deck.
description.B: Draw and play all <c=abf5ff>Potions</c> from your Deck and Discards.

description.A: Duplicate a <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> in your hand, draw pile, or discards.
description.B: Duplicate a <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> in your hand twice.
